鋟字的基本解释

鋟
qǐn
见“锓”。

鋟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qǐn］［qiān］
［《廣韻》七稔切，上寢，清。］
［《廣韻》子廉切，平鹽，精。］
“锓1”的繁体字。
(1)刻；雕刻。
(2)特指雕刻书板。
[②]［jiān］
［《廣韻》子廉切，平鹽，精。］
同“尖1”。“锓2”的繁体字。
引申为尖刻。

鋟字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鋟； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1308第04
【集韻】千廉切，音籤。刻也。【公羊傳·定八年】睋而鋟其板。【註】以爪刻其板。或作鑯。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?七稔切，音寢。又【集韻】【韻會】?子鴆切，音浸。義?同。　又【集韻】子朕切，音䤐。【博雅】錐也。　又【集韻】【韻會】千尋切【正韻】千林切，?音侵。義同。　又【廣韻】子廉切【集韻】將廉切，?音尖。【博雅】銳也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qǐn］［qiān］
["Guang Yun" Qi Min cuts, goes to bed, clears. ]
["Guangyun" Zilian cut, flat salt, fine. ]
"锓1" in traditional characters.
(1) Carving; carving.
(2) Especially refers to the carved book board.
[②]［jiān］
["Guangyun" Zilian cut, flat salt, fine. ]
Same as "tip 1". "锓2" in traditional characters.
The extension is acrimonious.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　锓; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1308 Page 04
[Jiyun] Qianlian cut, phonetic sign. Engraved too. 【The Story of Gongyang·Ding eight years】Take a look at it. [Note] Engrave the board with claws. Or make Tan.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun]? Seven Minor cuts, sound sleeps. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? The sub-dun cut, sound soaked. Righteous? Same.　 [Ji Yun] Zi Zhen cut, Yin Wa. [Bo Ya] Cone also.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Qianxun Cut [Zheng Yun] Qianlin Cut,? Sound invasion. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Zilian cut [Jiyun] cut Lian again,? The sound tip. [Bo Ya] Rui Ye.
